display_long_description:
Step into the heart-pounding world of Monkey Mayhem, an online VR horror game where every moment is a test of your courage and wits. Inspired by the iconic Big Scary, this fan game combines suspenseful gameplay, immersive environments, and unique challenges across multiple terrifying levels.

Explore dark and mysterious settings, face nightmarish creatures, and uncover secrets as you progress through the game. Whether you’re playing with friends or braving the horror solo, Monkey Mayhem offers an unforgettable VR experience.

Available now on App Lab—can you conquer the chaos and survive the mayhem?

Features:
	•	Online multiplayer for shared scares.
	•	Multiple levels with increasing difficulty and suspense.
	•	Terrifying monsters to evade or confront.
	•	Immersive horror inspired by Big Scary.
	•	Optimized for VR, delivering spine-chilling gameplay like never before.

Dare to play? The mayhem awaits!
